title: BIA
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Health food restaurant with juice bar. Offers a variety of American style food like acai bowl, vegan cheesecake, portobello sandwich (cheese), quinoa and amaranth falafel, and cactus and has mushrom tacos and vegetable soups. Has almond and coconut milk for drinks. Items with dairy can be requested without.
streetAddress: Av. Secretaria de Marina 463, Lomas del Chamizal, Cuajimalpa
